abstract: Highlights of Frederic Rzewksi's compositions and political events that inspired them listed.

headline.print_headline: Frederic Rzewski: A Primer on His Work
headline.main: A Primer to One of America’s Most Political Composers

keywords.value: Variations on The People United Will Never Be Defeated (Musical Work)

snippet: These five works by Frederic Rzewski address issues dear to his heart — and reflect his deep convictions.
